name: Stealth - hardcore puzzle
description:
Stealth - hardcore action. The game in which you need to think here and now. Each delay can cost you a level failure. Only meaningful actions, quick and sharp movements will help you to get to the end of the level. Hide or eliminate enemies using sound bombs, rescue hostages, this and much more interesting await you in the minimalist Stealth world.

Main Features:
100 unique levels
Not step by step Stealth
Additional objects in the game
The ability to eliminate enemies
Enjoyable graphics
Lots of options for level passing
